description.displayText: Justina took  care of  my grandmother so well. We can never forget her,  she is so professional,  kind and very patience.
description.originalText: Justina took  care of  my grandmother so well. We can never forget her,  she is so professional,  kind and very patience.

description.displayText: Justina was an amazing caregiver to my father.  He was on hospice and in his home.  When she first started he was able to do just about everything for himself, and in the end he needed help with everything.  Justina was there for my father no matter what his needs were.  She was always professional and always kind and caring.  She made sure that whatever he wanted or needed was taken care of with his dignity in tact.  Even when he was too weak to get out of bed, if he wanted to, she made that happen.  His comfort and quality of life were always her priority.  Whether my family was there with my dad, or not, we knew that Justina was there taking wonderful care of him.  She went above and beyond her job description. We will forever be grateful to Justina!

description.displayText: Justina gives excellent service to the people she takes care of. She is a faithful employee and would really promote the image and reputation of the organization she works for. She is very good at what she does!
